# Bayes

## Misc

-   Packages
    -   [{]{style="color: #990000"}[Blend](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/Blend/index.html){style="color: #990000"}[}]{style="color: #990000"} - Robust Bayesian Longitudinal Regularized Semiparametric Mixed Models

        -   C++ for fast, efficient MCMC
